[vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1449829383513{margin-bottom: 60px !important;}”][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-9 vc_col-md-9″][vc_column_text]

Track any Freight Management shipment

Track any BestLogistics Freight Management shipment. If you require maximum visibility to your customer Freight Management transactions, contact your BestLogistics Representative, or local BestLogistics Service Center.[/vc_column_text]

    Transportation mode

    Search Type

    Search Number(s)*

    This will return up to 100 records matching your criteria.

    [/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″ offset=”vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs”][vc_btn title=”Download Brochure” style=”outline” shape=”round” color=”theme_style_1″ align=”left” i_icon_fontawesome=”stm-download” button_block=”true” add_icon=”true”][vc_btn title=”Ask Our Experts” style=”outline” shape=”round” color=”theme_style_1″ align=”left” i_icon_fontawesome=”stm-skype” button_block=”true” add_icon=”true” css=”.vc_custom_1447746632849{margin-bottom: 50px !important;}”][stm_recent_posts_widget number=”3″ show_date=”1″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” el_class=”secondary_bg_color” css=”.vc_custom_1447746818281{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column][vc_cta h2=”Not sure which solution fits your business needs?” shape=”square” add_button=”right” btn_title=”Contact Now” btn_style=”outline” btn_shape=”round” btn_color=”white” btn_i_align=”right” btn_i_icon_fontawesome=”stm-arrow-next” btn_add_icon=”true” el_class=”secondary_bg_color” btn_link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Flogistics.stylemixthemes.com%2Fcontacts%2F|title:Contacts”][/vc_cta][/vc_column][/vc_row]
